title: FS: T213 (Type 2) Coupon Walter Johnson SGC 55
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T213 (Type 2) Coupon Walter Johnson SGC 55
posts.post_content:
Phenomenal card! Highest graded T213 Coupon example by far. Only centering downgrades what looks like a near-mint card otherwise. Asking $3000 net, PayPal preferred.

Successful transactions with: Sean1125, 39special, Ericc22, asoriano, Econteachert205, oldcardboard, tolstoi, Jobu, simas7173, espomario, jmb, Charlie Faust III, Paul S, quitcrab, avalanche2006, Beatles Guy, Banjo, tjenkins, botn,  trdcrdkid, jtschantz, longstreet766, greenmonster66, edjs, Paul S, jb67, rhotchkiss, Puckettfan, mybuddyinc, frankbmd, Baseball*Collections, btcarfagno, Luke, vintageonlybb, bigfish, Luke, t206collector, marvymelvin, benginino9, bigedmachine, Stampsfan, Moonlight Graham, Rebublicaninmass
Happy holidays! This Johnson card is still available.
No creasing, scuffing, or paper loss anywhere.
